description:
Ninny and Noel try to fight the Märchen that appeared before it destroys all of London.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If a Lion Could Speak, We Couldn`t Understand
If a Lion Could Speak, We Couldn`t Understand
If a lion could speak, we couldn`t understand
إن أمكن للأسد أن يتكلّم، ما كنّا لنفهم
